channel.title: A full tutorial for vista users?
channel.description:
Titles says it all, i tried google i tried searching the forums with the bar and going through pages and pages but nothing. so if someone has a link or their own tutorial they could post, that would be great! thank you
edit: i used to use windows xp and worked fine, but now that i have vista it doesn't let anyone log in and i've done the best port forwarding that i can on this but nothing works.

item.title: A full tutorial for vista users?
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

i’ve port forwarded with vista & xp its the same lol

Read full topic
